profile.name: Kishan Thakkar
profile.tagline: Building offline-first, payment-grade Android systems used in real businesses.
profile.summary: Senior Android Engineer with 6+ years of experience in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and Clean Architecture, specializing in POS systems, offline-first architectures, and payment workflows.

highlights: Migrated legacy Android codebases to a multi-module Clean Architecture setup
Architected a white-label POS platform using product flavors
Designed offline-first payment workflows using Room and WorkManager, reducing payment time by 70%
Integrated PAX, Verifone, and Visa Tap-to-Glass terminals
Implemented coroutine-based, non-blocking calculation pipelines reducing UI frame drops by 56%
Built a high-performance multimedia application using C++ (NDK), Oboe, and FFmpeg
Reduced audio latency from 500ms+ to under 100ms
Implemented Reels-style video feeds with stable 60fps performance
Owned the Android application lifecycle from requirements to Play Store deployment
Built AR-based utility apps using ARCore and OpenGL
